experiences.name: Stanley Park Seawall (Partial Loop)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t attempt the entire seawall unless you have a full half-day. Don’t start late afternoon expecting a relaxed pace.

experiences.name: Stanley Park Interior (Quiet Walks)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t skip interior trails if crowds are high elsewhere. Don’t expect ocean views — this is about calm and greenery.

experiences.name: Granville Island (Off-Peak)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t go between 11:30am–3:30pm on weekends. Don’t expect a quiet experience.

experiences.name: Vancouver Art Gallery
experiences.regret_message: Don’t visit on a clear sunny day unless you genuinely want indoor time. Don’t expect large permanent exhibits.

experiences.name: Museum of Anthropology (MOA)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t schedule less than 2–3 hours. Don’t pair with another major activity the same day.

experiences.name: Capilano Suspension Bridge
experiences.regret_message: Don’t go midday in peak season. Don’t expect solitude or a long experience.

experiences.name: Lynn Canyon (Suspension Bridge + Trails)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t wear city shoes. Don’t expect a “quick stop.”

experiences.name: Grouse Mountain (Skyride + Summit)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t go if visibility is uncertain. Don’t underestimate crowd levels in summer.

experiences.name: Grouse Grind (Hike)
experiences.regret_message: Don’t attempt without water or preparation. Not for families or low energy days.

experiences.name: False Creek Ferry + Seawall
experiences.regret_message: Don’t treat this as a main attraction. Don’t rush it — it’s about pacing.

experiences.name: Queen Elizabeth Park
experiences.regret_message: Don’t skip the viewpoint. Prefer morning or late afternoon for best light.

experiences.name: North Shore Scenic Drive + Stops
experiences.regret_message: Don’t attempt during rush hour. Don’t overpack the itinerary.
